author: Special Correspondent
text:
The CBI has sought a certified copy of the report of an internal audit of the DDCA, as part of a preliminary enquiry.

Based on a complaint by Kirti Azad, the agency has instituted the inquiry into alleged irregularities in the occupation of land and stadium work.

In a fresh letter to the DDCA general secretary, the CBI has now sought a certified copy of the report of an internal audit for the period April 1, 2013, to March 31, 2014, along with relied upon documents.
title: CBI seeks internal audit copy
